issue.title: [Dev][CI] Add overview of all tasks (including passing) on crossbow dashboard
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://crossbow.voltrondata.com/ currently shows the failing tasks, but it would still be useful to have an overview of all tasks, including the passing builds (+ their logs), as well.
